channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 19:50 plout anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Solve for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 19:50 plout anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Solve for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 18:13 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 18:13 Flashing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
